description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe that defines the build configuration and metadata for the ncurses library within the Yocto Project/OpenEmbedded build system. It specifies dependencies, compilation flags, source URI, packaging details, and build functions related to ncurses.

classes.name: autotools
classes.description: Inheritance from autotools for build configuration.

classes.name: update-alternatives
classes.description: Inheritance to handle alternative system links.

methods.name: ncurses_configure
methods.description: Helper function to configure the build with various options and directories.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Overrides the default autotools configure to run custom configuration steps, including applying patches and setting environment variables.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Builds the ncurses libraries and programs, respecting the ENABLE_WIDEC flag.

methods.name: do_test
methods.description: Verifies that narrow and wide character headers are compatible by comparing their preprocessed versions.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the built ncurses libraries, includes terminfo files, creates necessary linker scripts, and handles headers and compatibility links.
